q0.question: Why does Shastri Chacha tell Abbas to go back to his village?
q0.recall: Shastri Chacha tells Abbas to move to his village, Ranakpur, where he assures Abbas that he will get him a job at his boss, Prithviraj Raghuvanshi's place. There is no indication that Shastri Chacha tells Abbas to go back to his village.
q0.vectordb: Shastri Chacha tells Abbas to go back to his village to get a job at his boss, Prithviraj Raghuvanshi's place.
q0.hybrid: Shastri Chacha tells Abbas to go back to his village to get a job at his boss, Prithviraj Raghuvanshi's place.

q1.question: What is Abbas Ali's sister's name?
q1.recall: Abbas Ali's sister's name is Sania (Asin Thottumkal).
q1.vectordb: Abbas Ali's sister's name is Sania.
q1.hybrid: Abbas Ali's sister's name is Sania (Asin Thottumkal).

q2.question: Who is Shastri Chacha?
q2.recall: Shastri Chacha is their family friend who convinces them to move to his village, Ranakpur, where he assures Abbas that he will get him a job at his boss, Prithviraj Raghuvanshi's place.
q2.vectordb: Shastri Chacha is a family friend who convinces Abbas and his sister to move to Ranakpur and assures Abbas that he will get him a job at his boss, Prithviraj Raghuvanshi's place.
q2.hybrid: Shastri Chacha is a family friend who convinces Abbas and his sister to move to Ranakpur and assures Abbas that he will get him a job at his boss, Prithviraj Raghuvanshi's place.
